languages.english-overview:
Postfix Admin is a web based interface used to manage mailboxes, virtual domains and aliases. It also features support for vacation/out-of-the-office messages.
Postfixadmin is released under the GNU General Public License.

ul.li: Web based administration for a virtual Postfix mail server

languages.english-err_passlen5: The password length should be 5 or more characters.
languages.english-err_passchardigit: Password should contain at least 3 characters and at least 2 digits.
